modName: Gloomy War Era 4_ENB True low Hardware Requirements ver Completed
summary:
Gloomy War Era Ⅳ_ENB ε The cold & darker era has befallen.
True low Hardware Requirements ver Completed
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/52169-5-1395074985.png[/img]
[font=Times New Roman][size=5][color=#ff0000][b]A dark tendencies enb[/b][/color][/size][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][size=5][color=#ff0000][b]Gloomy War Era Ⅳ_ENB ε The cold & darker era has befallen[/b][/color][/size][/font]

[color=#00ffff][b][size=6][font=courier new,courier,monospace]I can not express too much, you can find a lot of useful information here.[/font][/size][/b][/color]
[color=#00ff00][size=5]Guide to ENBSeries - Teaching you how to tweak ENB [/size][/color][color=#ff0000][b][size=4]by --JawZ--[/size][/b][/color]
 
[size=5][font=times new roman,times,serif][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39742/?][color=#ff0000][b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39742/?[/b][/color][/url][/font][/size]

[center][color=#00ffff][size=5][font=times new roman,times,serif]INSTALLATION
Like any other ENB; remove all previous files/folders of any other ENB you might of had (all of it!)
Copy the contents of that folder into the Skyrim folder where TESV.exe is located.[/font][/size][/color][/center]
[center] [/center]
[center][size=5][font=times new roman,times,serif][color=#00ffff]When that is done visit ENB download page [/color][url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html][color=#ff0000]HERE[/color][/url][color=#ff0000] [/color][color=#00ffff]and get the latest Binary.[/color][/font][/size][/center]
[center][color=#00ffff][size=5][font=times new roman,times,serif]Copy d3d9.dll from the Wrapper folder into your Skyrim folder.[/font][/size][/color][/center]

[font=Times New Roman][size=5][color=#00ffff][b]Sorry, I'm from China.[/b][/color][/size][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][size=5][color=#00ffff][b]You can find the most detailed information at here.[/b][/color][/size][/font]

[url=http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-4248963-1-1.html]http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-4248963-1-1.html[/url]
[color=#ff0000][size=6][font=times new roman,times,serif]Recommend installing this plugin: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50855/?]Shadows[/url][/font][/size][/color]

[center][color=#ffa07a][b][size=5][font=comic sans ms,cursive]May not match these plug-ins:[/font][/size][/b][/color]
 [/center]
[LIST]
[*]
[size=5][font=georgia,serif][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802][color=#00ff00]Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel V3.1[/color][/url][color=#00ff00] by JJC71[/color][/font][/size]
[/*]
[*]
[size=5][font=georgia,serif][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27022][color=#00ff00]Supreme Storms for Climates of Tamriel 3_1[/color][/url][color=#00ff00] by MannyGT (optional, but recommended)[/color][/font][/size]
[/*]
[*]
[size=5][font=georgia,serif][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39799][color=#00ff00]Climates of Tamriel - Weather Patch[/color][/url][color=#00ff00] by prod80[/color][/font][/size]
[/*]
[/LIST]

[size=5][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif][color=#00ff00]A:[/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30450][color=#00ff00]Realistic Lighting Overhaul 4.0.8.02[/color][/url][color=#00ff00] by The Realistic Lighting Team
 
B:[/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043][color=#00ff00]Enhanced Lights and FX 0.4.2[/color][/url][color=#00ff00] by anamorfus[/color][/font][/size]
 
[center][color=#00ff00][b][font=comic sans ms,cursive][size=5]Using these plug-ins for this ENB may make your screen becomes a strange.[/size][/font][/b][/color][/center]

[color=#ff0000][b][size=5][font=courier new,courier,monospace]My PC configuration:[/font][/size][/b][/color]
[color=#ff0000][size=5][font=lucida sans unicode,lucida grande,sans-serif]Graphics:650M[/font][/size][/color]
[color=#ff0000][size=5][font=courier new,courier,monospace]CPU:i7-3630QM
RAM:2x4GB[/font][/size][/color]
author: Lingyang Tan
